ن
السّاكن يومئذ بمــدينة أشمون يوفّيه ذلك
جمادى ربيع الآخــر سنة أربــع وسبعين ومائتن لا يدافــع بذلك ولا يحتجّ فيه بحجّة على الوجوه
والأسباب كلّها ومن قام بذكر الحقّ اقتضا ما فيه
إن شا اللّه ومن أحال عليه أقر له بحقّــه شهد على ذلك

*** n ***
***** ăs sākin yawma ʾiḏ:in bi madīnaẗi ʾušmūna yuwaffī hi ḏālika ***
ǧumādà rabīʿa ăl ʾāḫari ʾāḫiri sanaẗa ʾarbaʿ:in wa sabʿīna wa miʾatayni lā yudāfiʿu bi ḏālika wa lā yaḥtaǧǧu fī hi bi ḥuǧǧaẗ:in ʿalà ăl wuǧūhi
wa ăl ʾasbābi kulli hā wa man qāma bi ḏikri ăl ḥaqqi ĭqtaḍā mā fī hi ***
ʾin šāʾa ăl lāhu *** wa man ʾaḥāla ʿalay hi ʾaqarra la hu bi ḥaqqi hi šahida ʿalà ḏālika ***

[...... residing] at this time in the town of Ašmûn; he will pay this fully to him [..............]
[...... of the secon]d [.......] of the year two hundred and seventy [fou]r. He will not dela[y the payment thereof nor will he bring forward any pretext in respect thereto for whatever cause]
[or r]ea[son] there may be, and whosoever presents himself [with (this) wr]itten in[strument shall receive what (is mentioned) therein,]
[if God will,] (the debtor) will recognize the rights of any person to whom he (the creditor) may transfer (them). [The following witnesses have testified to it: ]
